Data Collection Methods
====================

Collection Framework
-----------------
Overview of data collection methodology.

Data Sources
----------
Primary sources of research data:

1. Question Responses
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* Multiple choice answers
* Written responses
* Time-based metrics

2. User Interactions
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* Response patterns
* Time allocation
* Error analysis

3. Feedback Data
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* User feedback
* Expert reviews
* System analytics

Collection Protocols
-----------------
Standardized procedures for data collection:

* Data validation
* Quality assurance
* Error handling
* Privacy protection

Implementation Guidelines
----------------------
Steps for implementing data collection:

1. Setup and preparation
2. Data gathering
3. Validation checks
4. Storage and backup
